page.title: 14TRAIN SURVEY
page.content: 3 Early morning trains from Severn Beach, 07.58, 08.54, 09.5666. Most users were regulars, going to work in Avonmouth and Bristol, office workers (one man made false teeth). Severn Beach is a small country branch line terminal. 17 journeys each way daily (2 trsins) via St Andrews Road, Avonmouth, Shirehampton, Sea Mills (along R.Avon) Clifton Down, Redland, Montpelier, Stapleton Roae, Lawrence Hill, Temple Meads in centre of Bristol. Earliest 05.15 latest 22.12. 17% of passengers lived in caravans, 22% had cars, 3% had cycles.
